"Play a song for me" - The AI can play a song on the guitar by using a pre-recorded song or by generating a random song on the fly. This can be a great way to relax or to entertain someone.
"Learn how to play the guitar" - The AI can provide lessons on how to play the guitar, including how to hold the guitar, how to read music, and how to play different chords and songs.
"Find a guitar lesson near me" - The AI can use a user's location to find local guitar lessons, including private lessons, group lessons, and online lessons.
"Find a guitar teacher" - The AI can use a user's location to find local guitar teachers, including private teachers and group teachers.
"Find a guitar shop near me" - The AI can use a user's location to find local guitar shops, including music stores and online stores.
